entities: E3/EU+3 (China, France, Germany, the Russian Federation, the United Kingdom, and the United States)
reporting_cycle: The Director General of the IAEA to provide regular updates to the IAEA Board of Governors and, as appropriate, in parallel to the Security Council on Iranâ€™s implementation of its commitments under the JCPOA every six months
summary:
**7. Working Group on Implementation of Sanctions Lifting**

* A working group will assist the Joint Commission on sanctions lifting implementation.
* The working group will review and consult on issues related to sanctions lifting.
* If an issue remains unresolved, it may be referred to the Joint Commission.
This Annex describes the sequence of actions specified in Annexes I and II to the JCPOA.

A. Finalisation Day 
The E3/EU+3 and Iran will endorse the JCPOA. 
The proposed UN Security Council resolution will be submitted for adoption without delay. 
The EU will endorse the UN Security Council resolution through Council Conclusions. 
Iran and the IAEA will start developing arrangements to implement transparency measures.

B. Adoption Day 
Adoption Day will occur 90 days after UN Security Council endorsement or earlier by mutual consent. 
JCPOA participants will make arrangements for implementation of their commitments. 
Iran will inform the IAEA of its intention to apply the Additional Protocol and implement the modified code 3.1. 
Iran will implement paragraph 66 from Section M. 
The EU will adopt a regulation terminating nuclear-related economic and financial EU sanctions. 
The US will issue waivers ceasing the application of statutory nuclear-related sanctions.
